'''Elizabeth Moody''' ([[29 October|October 29]], [[1939]] - [[12 January|January 12]], [[2010]]) was a New Zealand actress. She played [[Lobelia Sackville-Baggins]] in the [[The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring (extended edition)|extended edition]] of  ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring]]'', which turned out to be her last acting credit.
